Hi.
In beginning of section 4.4.1, we read:
############# excerpt begin ###=
############

4.4.1.=A0Pre-fetch processing chain


The first chain is resp=
onsible for investigating if the URI could be
crawled at this point. That i=
ncludes checking if all preconditions are met
(DNS-lookup, fetching robots.=
txt, authentication). It is also possible to
completely block the crawling =
of URIs that have passed through the scope
check.


In the Pre-Processing c=
hain the following two processors should be included
(or replacement module=
s that perform similar operations):

############# excerpt end ############=
###


I suppose, that "In the Pre-Processing chain ...." should read "In th=
e
Pre-fetch- processing chain ...".
